CustomField.formula: IF( ISNULL( EBITDA_MM_Asia__c ) , "N/A" , TEXT( Currency_EBITDA__c ) + " " + IF ( EBITDA_MM_Asia__c >= 1000, TEXT( EBITDA_MM_Asia__c / 1000 ) + " BN" , TEXT( EBITDA_MM_Asia__c ) + " MM" ) ) + if(OR(ISNULL(TEXT( ED__c )), TEXT( ED__c ) = "--"), ""," "+TEXT(ED__c) )
CustomField.label: EBITDA (Reporting - Asia)
